intolerance.name: Intolerance
intolerance.description: Content or behavior which is hateful or intolerant toward a group of people.

bad-behavior.name: Bad Behavior
bad-behavior.description: Harassment, bullying, and threats toward other users.

rude.name: Rude
rude.description: Behavior which is rude toward other users.

upsetting.name: Upsetting
upsetting.description: Shocking, disgusting, or generally upsetting content.

troubling.name: Troubling
troubling.description: Bad news, troubling information, or dispiriting content.

hate-group-mention.name: Hate Group Coverage
hate-group-mention.description: Images of terror groups, articles covering events, etc.

discourse.name: Discourse / Drama
discourse.description: On-going discussions or debates that may be frustrating.

curation.name: Curation
curation.description: Judgment of the moderators to remove content not worth showing.

spam.name: Spam
spam.description: Content which doesn't add to the conversation.

misinfo.name: Misinformation
misinfo.description: Content which misleads or defrauds users.

context.name: Context
context.description: Helpful annotations to explain intent, such as satire or parody.
